hero.title: STEVEN   NTY
hero.subtitle: I create stories that last – editing with soul & precision.

about.title: About me
about.text: I'm Steven Nty – a passionate video editor with 4 years of experience. My focus is on emotional storytelling and detailed, high-quality editing.

pricing.title: Prices per video
pricing.info: Each project is individually calculated. I only take on a few clients at a time to ensure the highest quality.

starter.title: Starter
starter.desc: One video (up to 60 sec) – basic editing, clean cuts, perfect for social media

pro.title: Pro
pro.desc: One video (1–3 min) – advanced editing, B-roll, color grading, sound design

premium.title: Premium
premium.desc: One video (3–10 min) – high-end editing, storytelling, motion graphics, consultation

pricing.disclaimer: Prices are for orientation. The final price is determined individually based on effort and requirements.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Send me a message right now and let's discuss your project.

lines: Feel free to check out all my videos,

approach.title: Our Process
approach.subtitle: From your idea to the finished video – this is how we work together.

step1.title: 1. Contact
step1.desc: You reach out to me with your project idea over the contact formular or WhatsApp – let's talk about your vision.

step2.title: 2. Concept & Planning
step2.desc: We develop a concept tailored to your goals and define the scope of the project.

step3.title: 3. Production
step3.desc: Filming or receiving your footage – everything is prepared for editing.

step4.title: 4. Editing & Fine-Tuning
step4.desc: I cut, edit, color-grade, and refine your video until it perfectly tells your story.

step5.title: 5. Delivery
step5.desc: You receive the finished video in your desired format, ready for publishing.

impressum.title: Legal Notice
impressum.note: According to § 19 UStG, no VAT is charged (small business regulation).
impressum.disclaimer: This legal notice also applies to our social media profiles.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the legal data protection regulations (GDPR).
datenschutz.dataCollectionTitle: Collection and Processing of Personal Data
datenschutz.dataCollectionText: We only collect personal data if you voluntarily provide it to us via the contact form or by email. This data is used solely for processing your request and will only be stored as long as necessary for that purpose.
datenschutz.rightsText: You have the right at any time to receive information about your stored data, as well as the right to correct, delete, or restrict its processing. You may also object to the processing of your data at any time.
datenschutz.cookiesText: Our website only uses technically necessary cookies. No tracking or marketing cookies are used.
datenschutz.securityText: We use technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
datenschutz.changesText: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time to keep it current.
